Description_lang: Taking damage has a chance to fill you with $@spellname426289, causing your abilities to deal $425838s1 additional Fire damage split between nearby enemies for $426289d and shielding you for the damage dealt.Damage increased per enemy struck, up to 5.
AuraDescription_lang: Taking damage has a chance to fill you with $@spellname426289, causing your abilities to deal $425838w1 additional Fire damage split between nearby enemies for $426289d and shielding you for the damage dealt.Damage increased per enemy struck, up to 5.
